Text.Value: Draw your weapon.
Keep quiet.
*As its influence wanes, they clutch their heads, blinking in confusion.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: Thalls clutch their heads and look around confused

Text.Value: LET IT DIE.
Let it die, or join it.
... you... you did this! You want to kill her!

EditorData.AnimationTags: Three thralls slowly stand, looking at player
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Cut to motion - a beat and a confused shake of the head as he tries and fails to clear it
EditorData.NodeContext: Take a beat and confused shake of the head before the line. He's under the control of an alien beast, and it's just persuaded him that we're threatening his (non-existent) daughter.

Text.Value: *The person they're digging from the rubble - it's the illithid from the ship. Wounded, but still alive.*
*The survivor they're trying to save - it's the ghaik from the ship.*
*The mind flayer from the ship - it's taken their brittle minds for its own.*
*The person they're trying to save... it's the creature from the ship! Still alive, but wounded.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: Thalls still kneeling by rubble/ dying mindflayer, pulling at rubble
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: close up of the half-dead mind flayer

Text.Value: Step back. I'm here to help.
*Your voice cuts through the fog of confusion - you can see the creature's hold on them wavering.*
Help, yes... it's my daughter.

EditorData.NodeContext: Confused, explaining that he's trying to dig his daughter out of rubble. When in truth it's an alien being dominating his mind

Text.Value: If you cannot resist the ghaik's power, I must cut you down.
It's clouding your minds. Look at what's in front of you.
Monster? That's my daughter - she's dying!

EditorData.AnimationTags: Three thalls - still kneeling - turn and look at player
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: They turn from the wreckage to look at the player - VFX playing to show mindflayer's control of them

Text.Value: Watch out! He's here to kill her!
Watch out! She's here to kill her!

EditorData.AnimationTags: Three thralls stand and turn to player - preparing to fight

Text.Value: *Your words fall on deaf ears - the creature's hold on them is too strong.*
Don't die, don't die, don't die...

EditorData.AnimationTags: Thalls still kneeling by rubble/ dying mindflayer
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: still with back to the player, on knees, trying to remove wreckage

Text.Value: What are you doing? Let the monster die.
Come on, dig! Faster! Get her out of there!

EditorData.AnimationTags: Thralls 2 and 3 on their knees - backs to the camera - try to pull away rubble, mindflayer lies on the gound - wounded, Thrall 1 stads over them shouting
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: with their backs to the player, the NPCs are attempting to move some wreckage pinning down the wounded mind flayer - custom scene viewer
EditorData.StateChangeTags: mindflayer lies on the gound - wounded
